author: Staff Reporter
text:
The police arrested 12 persons including 10 women who went on a chain snatching spree during the consecration of a temple at Murungapakkam on Wednesday and recovered 20 sovereigns of jewellery from them.

Police sources said the arrested identified as Muthu, Pechi, Kasturi and Santhi of Paramakudi, Seenikumari, Nandini, Kumar, Mohandass, Pavithra, Jothi, Kannagi and Vinitha of Chennai melted into the crowd gathered at the consecration of Sri Draupadi Amman Temple and managed to snatch jewellery from the women worshippers.

A team of police personnel in plainclothes caught them red-handed and recovered 20 sovereigns of jewellery from them.

Investigations revealed that the accused used to target devotees at temple festivals. A case has been registered.
title: 12 held for chain snatching
